title: How to Mix a Pomegranate Margarita

steps.headline: Combine the ice cubes, juice, tequila, triple sec and lime juice in a blender.
Put the lid on the blender securely.
Pulse the ingredients until they become frothy.
Run a lime wedge around the rim of each glass.
Invert the glasses, one at a time, and press the rims into a saucer filled with margarita salt.
Turn the glasses upright and pour the cocktail into each one, being careful not to disturb the salt around the rims.
Mix equal amounts of sugar and water in a saucepan over medium heat and bring to a boil.
Reduce to low heat and simmer, stirring occasionally with a rubber spatula until sugar is completely dissolved; about 7-10 minutes.

text: Steps Combine the ice cubes, juice, tequila, triple sec and lime juice in a blender.  Put the lid on the blender securely.  Pulse the ingredients until they become frothy.  Run a lime wedge around the rim of each glass.  Invert the glasses, one at a time, and press the rims into a saucer filled with margarita salt.  Turn the glasses upright and pour the cocktail into each one, being careful not to disturb the salt around the rims.  Done. It's now ready to serve. Making It Differently Mix equal amounts of sugar and water in a saucepan over medium heat and bring to a boil.  Reduce to low heat and simmer, stirring occasionally with a rubber spatula until sugar is completely dissolved; about 7-10 minutes.  Remove from heat and cool completely and proceed to juice your fruit while it is cooling  Squeeze lemons and (all) limes with the juicer and run through a fine-mesh strainer to remove pulp and seeds. Reserving 1 oz. fresh lime juice for mixing later. Carefully pour your simple syrup into the lidded container (a funnel could be helpful depending on your container).  Carefully add ½ cup strained lime juice and 1 cup strained lemon juice to simple syrup mixture into a lidded container (a funnel could be helpful depending on your container).  Shake well and refrigerate after use.  Store in fridge up to 2 weeks.  Combine Tequila, Cointreau, Pama Pomegranate liqueur, 1 ½ oz. fresh sour mix, 1 oz. fresh lime juice in a shaker filled with ice. Shake ingredients well and strain over a pint glass filled with ice. Have fun here, pull out your best Tom Cruise Cocktail shaking skills. The frothier the better! Garnish with 6-7 pomegranate seeds and a wedge of lime. ENJOY!
